What three movies, in order from release date, make up the "Dollars Trilogy"?
OptionA: "For a Few Dollars More", "A Fistful of Dollars", "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly"
OptionB: "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly", "For A Few Dollars More", "A Fistful of Dollars"
OptionC: "A Fistful of Dollars", "For a Few Dollars More", "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly"
OptionD: "For a Few Dollars More", "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly", "A Fistful of Dollars"
CorrectAnswer: "A Fistful of Dollars", "For a Few Dollars More", "The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly"
